title: 有大佬帮忙看看怎么搞吗 hmcl崩溃
author: NO烈阳
txt_content:
我更新了一下拔刀剑mod 增加了一个附属mod就这样了





image.png
(221.62 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-2-20 14:07 上传

(220.48 KB, 下载次数: 0)

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
NO烈阳 发表于 2020-2-20 14:39
[就是这样
崩溃报告指的是crash-report,不是HMCL自己弹出的窗口

replies.txt_content: 是不是冲突了或者是没有前置

replies.author: NO烈阳
replies.txt_content:
如果能 能告诉我是哪两个吗
我装了100多的mod

replies.author: Kujouamedaku
replies.txt_content: 是crash-reports文件夹下的文件，这个才是崩溃报告

replies.author: NO烈阳
replies.txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  LesslagCorePlugin ([较少的滞后]lesslag-1.0-1.12.2.jar)
  DLFMLCorePlugin ([动态光源]DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.10.3-1.12.2.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin ([1.12.2][更快的加载]MakeZoomZoom-0.0.1.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.8.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Why did you do that?

Time: 2/17/20 5:51 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
NO烈阳 发表于 2020-2-23 07:11
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:PackagedAuto is an addon to Applied Energistics 2, and it aims to use "packages" of items to allow autocrafting with more than 9 items. That said, this mod is designed to be able to run without Applied Energistics 2, but installation with it is recommended.
https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... ations/dependencies

摘自https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/packagedauto/发布页面对于PackagedAuto的描述，而你根本没有安装AE2，所以只安装附属几个意思……

解决方法是下载安装AE2：
https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... plied-energistics-2

replies.author: NO烈阳
